Get to know us
DEDICATION.
CREATIVITY.
PASSION.
Nestled in the heart of Historic Downtown
    Fernandina Beach, David‚Äôs offers a unique
    and sophisticated dining experience.
    Under the guidance of Executive Chef and
    Owner David Echeverri, our restaurant
    has become a destination for private
    dining, where each meal is an upscale,
    memorable, and vibrant journey of flavors.
Our menu is driven by the finest
    ingredients, reflecting our team‚Äôs
    unwavering passion for culinary
    excellence. Every dish is crafted
    with meticulous attention to detail,
    transforming each plate into a work of art.
Whether you‚Äôre planning a special
    event, rehearsal dinner, private party, or
    corporate gathering, David‚Äôs is the perfect
    setting.
Since 2012, we have been dedicated to
    providing a distinctive dining experience
    for all our guests, using fresh and
    sustainable ingredients to take you on a
    culinary journey like no other.
From classic recipes to innovative
    culinary creations, each dish embodies
    our commitment to high-quality
    food, beautifully presented on unique
    dinnerware. With nightly specials crafted
    by Executive Chef David Echeverri‚Äîoften
    becoming menu favorites‚Äîwe invite you
    to join us tonight and allow us to exceed
    your expectations!
Skip Gallery Carousel
Start stop gallery carousel
David Echeverri
Meet The Chef
David is a Miami-born, Medell√≠n-raised
      chef and the Executive Chef and Owner
      of David‚Äôs Restaurant & Lounge. With
      over 15 years of experience, David has
      drawn on his Colombian heritage and
      South American flavors to create beautiful
      fusion dishes in every city he‚Äôs worked
      in. His signature dishes are known for
      their bold, sweet, and sour flavors, rich
      textures, and vibrant colors
One of David‚Äôs favorite dishes to prepare
      is his famous Grilled Octopus, topped with
      homemade chimichurri and served with
      sweet plantain bacon cheese croquettes
      and chorizo chipotle crema, finished
      with compressed cucumber and passion
      fruit gel. This dish took years to perfect
      as David experimented with various
      elements, sauces, and textures, ultimately
      combining the flavors he grew up with,
      such as sweet plantain, chorizo, passion
      fruit, and chimichurri. The result is a guest
      favorite at David‚Äôs Restaurant.
